OptionValues.status: test the exact string match for the HTTP status code
OptionValues.rstatus: test a regular expression for the HTTP status code
OptionValues.string: test the exact string match in the HTTP response body
OptionValues.rstring: test a regular expression on the HTTP response body

OptionValues.string: test the exact string match in the response buffer [default]
OptionValues.rstring: test a regular expression on the response buffer
